Articles.Content:
HI everyone !

I'm working on a really easy space-plane to used. It's designed to auto-take-off and having an orbit at about 100000m with enough oxidizer for back to Kerbin ! Let you about 150l of fuel to fly a bit when you come back in the atmosphere .

Easy to use :

1 RCS & SAS turn on .

2 Thrust at max power & hit space .

3 Wait about 30000m & switch R.A.P.I.E.R engine mode .

4 On AP , correct trajectory to a nice circle .

Custom keys :

1 R.A.P.I.E.R switch mode .

2 Toggle jet on/off .

9 Toggle antenna/ladder .

0 Sciences techs .

https://www.dropbox.com/s/mp3he09v0fw940e/2014-03-07_00001.jpg

It's a very simple plane with a great flying skill . Easy take off , easy flying , easy landing !

https://www.dropbox.com/s/yesz0aamr4flfd8/2014-03-07_00006.jpg

I made a lot of disastrous designs but this one is really great .

If people want to try it , i share it to you , feel free to make your own custom modification ! Hope you enjoy flying with it !

https://www.dropbox.com/s/agqeqry1ozzffbc/EZ-SuperSonic-SP.craft

Have a nice day & sorry for my English !

Edited March 7, 2014 by ZLM-Master
Could you upload some pictures too? I downloaded the craft and I really like it, but most people don't download stuff when they can't see the actual content.
